SEARCH
Package smile.math

Class Complex

java.lang.Object
smile.math.Complex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Complex extends Object implements Serializable
Complex number. The object is immutable so once you create and initialize a Complex object, you cannot modify it.
See Also:
